name: Kwanzaa Cooking Game
description: Kwanzaa Cooking Game is an educational experience created to teach kids about the food and culture of Kwanzaa. Kwanzaa is a holiday with a unique and important background, and teaching children about it early can help widen their worldview and understanding of different cultures. In this game, the player must catch falling ingredients in a certain order to make a dish, and then get to learn about its history and importance! This game should be used either as a teaching supplement in school or at home to help teach your child.
